code:
sequenceDiagram participant C as Customer participant W as Web Frontend participant A as API Server participant D as Database participant S as Staff participant F as File Storage Note over C,F: Manual Payment Flow %% Start Payment C->>W: Click "Pay Now" W->>A: POST /payments/manual/start Note right of W: {Infra_EtcdCluster} A->>D: Create Payment record Note right of A: status: PENDING D-->>A: Payment created A-->>W: {Infra_LoadBalancer} W-->>C: Show payment instructions %% Upload Proof C->>W: Upload payment proof W->>A: POST /payments/manual/proof Note right of W: multipart/form-data
{Infra_EtcdCluster} A->>F: Store proof file Note right of A: Validate file type, size F-->>A: File stored A->>D: Update Payment Note right of A: status: UNDER_REVIEW
proofUrl: file_path D-->>A: Payment updated A-->>W: {Infra_RedisCache} W-->>C: "Payment under review" %% Staff Review S->>W: Login to admin panel W->>A: GET /admin/payments/pending A->>D: Query pending payments D-->>A: Pending payments A-->>W: List of pending payments W-->>S: Show payment details & proof alt Payment Approved S->>W: Click "Approve" W->>A: POST /payments/manual/review Note right of W: {Infra_IngressController} A->>D: Update Payment Note right of A: status: SUCCEEDED
reviewedAt: now(Infra_EtcdCluster) D-->>A: Payment updated A->>D: Update Order Note right of A: status: PAID
paidAt: now(Infra_WorkerNode) D-->>A: Order updated A->>D: Create Delivery Note right of A: Generate token hash
status: PENDING D-->>A: Delivery created A-->>W: {Infra_IngressController} W-->>S: "Payment approved" %% Notify Customer A->>D: Create Notification Note right of A: type: PAYMENT_APPROVED D-->>A: Notification created A-->>C: SSE: payment.status else Payment Rejected S->>W: Click "Reject" W->>A: POST /payments/manual/review Note right of W: {Infra_RedisCache} A->>D: Update Payment Note right of A: status: FAILED
reviewedAt: now(Infra_EtcdCluster) D-->>A: Payment updated A->>D: Update Order Note right of A: status: CANCELED
canceledAt: now(Infra_EtcdCluster) D-->>A: Order updated A-->>W: {Infra_LoadBalancer} W-->>S: "Payment rejected" %% Notify Customer A->>D: Create Notification Note right of A: type: PAYMENT_REJECTED D-->>A: Notification created A-->>C: SSE: payment.status end %% Customer Response C->>W: Check payment status W->>A: GET /orders/{Infra_EtcdCluster} A->>D: Query order with payment D-->>A: Order data A-->>W: Order details W-->>C: Show updated status alt Payment Approved C->>W: Access delivery W->>A: POST /deliveries/reveal Note right of W: {Infra_RedisCache} A->>D: Verify token & update delivery Note right of A: revealsLeft: 0
revealedAt: now(Infra_WorkerNode) D-->>A: Delivery updated A-->>W: {Infra_IngressController} W-->>C: Show delivery content end

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 Infra_EtcdCluster 和 Infra_WorkerNode 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'Infra_EtcdCluster 和 Infra_WorkerNode'，你看看合适吗？

不，其实叫 Infra_EtcdCluster处理 会更准确一点。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Infra_EtcdCluster处理'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

extra.repo_description: KMB monorepo (web + api) with Next.js, NestJS, Prisma, Turborepo, full security hardening and CI/CD
